definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Millions of residences remain without power and water.
sentences.chinese: 數百萬戶家庭依然斷水斷電。

sentences.english: The South Korean government spends millions promoting contemporary Korean culture abroad.
sentences.chinese: 韓國政府花了數百萬的錢推廣當代韓國文化。

sentences.english: Many million years ago the territory of the present Perm region was occupied by the Perm Sea.
sentences.chinese: 現在的彼爾姆地區在數百萬年前還屬於彼爾姆海。

sentences.english: The key account manager must possess significant skill to run a multi-million dollar business.
sentences.chinese: 大客戶經理須具備經營數百萬美元生意的重要技能。

sentences.english: Millions of people every year view classic works of art in museums all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 每年，全世界數百萬人在博物館觀賞古典藝術作品。

sentences.english: Not too many for the millions of homeless.
sentences.chinese: 沒有太多的給那些數百萬無家可歸的人。

sentences.english: Millions of high school students have read "To Kill a Mockingbird".
sentences.chinese: 已有數百萬高中生讀過《殺死一隻知更鳥》。

sentences.english: Millions of middle-class Chinese have gambled on buying new apartments.
sentences.chinese: 數百萬的中國中產階級買房就像賭博。

sentences.english: And millions of people across the country have been able to keep their health insurance.
sentences.chinese: 全國數百萬計的人民已能保持他們的健康保險。

sentences.english: Millions of people starved to death during the war.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭中數百萬計的人捱餓至死。

sentences.english: At least 70 dead, millions affected in S China rainstorms .
sentences.chinese: 江西遭受暴雨襲擊，至少70人死亡，數百萬人受災。

sentences.english: Mr. Kumagai estimates it would cost millions of dollars to build a new municipal museum.
sentences.chinese: 熊谷勝預計新建一座市博物館可能要花費數百萬美元。

sentences.english: Millions of visitors come to Tongli every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年有數百萬的遊客到同裏來旅遊。

sentences.english: I could see why millions of people were choosing to migrate there.
sentences.chinese: 我能理解爲什麼數百萬人會選擇移居這裏。

sentences.english: Millions more are injured or disabled.
sentences.chinese: 還有數百萬人受傷或致殘。

sentences.english: Millions of children die each year due to water shortages or exposure to water-related diseases.
sentences.chinese: 每年數百萬兒童死於缺水或接觸和水有關的疾病。
